parse.title: Wake Now My Merry Lads! Wake and Hear Me Calling!

links.*: Poems in The Lord of the Rings

wikitext.*:
'''Wake Now My Merry Lads! Wake and Hear Me Calling!''' is one of the songs sung by [[Tom Bombadil]].<ref>{{FR|I8}}</ref>

==The poem==
<poem>
''Wake now my merry lads! Wake and hear me calling!''
''Warm now be heart and limb! The cold stone is fallen;''
''Dark door is standing wide; dead hand is broken.''
''Night under Night is flown, and the Gate is open!''
</poem>
